body: Second @rando's opinion, the staffs plz get your shits together.

Another why this site is such a shitstain, 89 doujins with Ai Haibara tagged as a character, and this fuckstick creates a new tag.  No wonder you can't ever find anything, and there are 5 or 6 reposts, and half the site is chinkchong copies with no original Japanese source posted.
why the fuck do we need another TAG for the same character??
